I liked the game spore, but when it got to the space stage, things just got boring, i mean the missions werent very good, and if you werent doing that, theres nothing else to do :/

WE WANT SPORE 2!

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Space stage was the best ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I was always conquering people, and trying to control the whole galaxy

> 
> I was always conquering people, and trying to control the whole galaxy

With mods and cheats, buy every weapon and eliminate ALL the cultures!

In all honesty, I cannot place Space Stage without mods. It\'s plain and simple too boring.

I suggest you give this mod a go (it works best with Galactic Adventures and Patch 5, but will also work with Vanilla Spore at patch 3):

[http://www.sporemodding.com/platinumspore](http://www.sporemodding.com/platinumspore)

While i find Spore to be pretty similar to KSP ins ome ways (Blow up your ship and you magically respawn, semi-cartoonish style) I am waiting for a second game instead of fiddling with all the flaws there is as of now.

Allied Grox once, almost crashed when i recieved 200 declarations of war at the same time.
Hehehe... I\'ve done that. I foudn that with enough cash, all the war declarees can be easily made into your allies very quickly.
I just wish that they\'d made the game we saw in the original promo vids.

It makes me wonder how they even actually make friends.
Spore would have been so much better like that.

I believe Spore 2 would be an excellent move because Spore right now has so much potential in it, so much to develop further and so on. I mean you could actually make every stage a single game(kind of boring though). ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Although my dream is a Mass Effect 3 universe with Spore-gameplay, with epic battles like the ending in ME3 and so on. Would be so awesome, but probably not possible. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) Still I think Space Stage in Spore is the coolest and most awesome thing ever, just dreaming about my empire and it\'s wealth and power. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Still haven\'t met Grox yet, my second playthrough and I\'m more aiming for a big empire than fighting Grox.

Seconded.

I know people who\'ve colonized/conquered the entire galaxy... Best I\'ve ever done is a galactic arm.

I believe Spore 2 should include KSP as a part of the Civilisation stage, perhaps the very beginning (planes, boats, land vehicles, built in the KSP style and flown around like that for a time), and the very beginning of the Space Stage (spaceplanes, rockets, etc). Then, there will be some different options for continuing. Solo, with similar flight as current KSP, but with FTl travel and all the rest of it, or as an RTS-style game in a way.

Doubtless to get anything like that would take a LOT of work and time, but it would be one EPIC game.

No.

KSP is it\'s own game. It is not part of another.

Ok, i should not have stopped space stage at the spice mission :-X

i agree space stage is good.
